p: At least 11 proteins [ORF1ab-encoded NS proteins (nsp1, nsp3, nsp5, nsp7, nsp14â€“16), structural proteins (E, M, N) and accessory protein ORF3s] have been recognised as IFN antagonists allowing PEDV to evade host interferon (IFN) responses (Ding et al. 2014; Wang et al. 2015; Zhang et al. 2016a). Decreased innate immune responses (specifically frequencies and function of NK cells) (Annamalai et al. 2015) likely contribute to the increased severity of PEDV infection in suckling vs. older (weaned, finisher, adult) pigs, as observed for TGEV infections (Derbyshire et al. 1969).
